document_name: JOINT PROGRAMME ON GENDER EQUALITY AND WOMEN'S EMPOWERMENT (00077285).doc
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/ETH/00061111/JOINT PROGRAMME ON GENDER EQUALITY AND WOMEN’S EMPOWERMENT (00077285).doc

outputs.output_descr: The UN Flagship Joint Programme on Gender Equality and Women's Empowerment is a framwork programme that provides  coordinated support to the Government of Ethiopia in four major strategic areas: 1) Increased accessibility of financial and non-financial services to economically disadvantaged women;2) Enabling environment created and support provided for girls and women to improve participation and access to secondary and teritiary education ;3) Strengthened institutional capacity for Gender Mainstreaming ;4) increased institutional capacity and community knowledge  and skills to promote and protect the rights of women and girls.UNDP support the 3rd key result area at both federal and regional levels.

project_descr: UN Flagship Joint Programme on Gender Equality and Women's Empowerment
project_title: UN Flagship Joint Programme on Gender
